file_content.text: Report in, verde!
On our way to the armory. Enemies thick.
Security office is well guarded. Still doomed.
Ion bombs are ready. We'll demolish their assault force.
Looks like those schematics were right. Got us straight to the armory.
Don't enjoy it too much. We're surrounded by Skytroopers down here!
Detonating ion bombs! Listen to them pop!
It's a blasted maze in here! We found the armory, but I lost half my crew.
You're on your own, Fett. We've got Skytroopers to deal with.
Die well, brothers.
Dalash!
I smell like boiling grease down here. Status!
You need support, Mandalore? Because my brothers and I just picked up two dozen plasma cannons.
My team's hitting the reactor next. Down to three warriors, but they'll be enough.
Good. Let's hope the newcomer and Torian find what they're looking for soon.
These weapons... too many for dead men to carry.
I can still rig the place to blow.
Torian and the newcomer--they need time. They promise the end of the Eternal Fleet!
Then we buy them time. With our lives, if need be.
All right, you pathetic excuses for warriors... three barrels of spiced tihaar to anyone who scraps more droids than Clan Fett!
A fool's bargain. You drank the last of the tihaar last night.
All the more reason to try and best us!
Keep talking, and even the newcomer will beat you.
Yenko Farr and his three sisters are dead!
Stranger, tell us you've kept the reinforcements at bay.
The droids are contained. Keep fighting.
"Keep fighting"? What else is there? Ha!
Both power stations are down!
All forces, begin withdrawal. Soon, we march into the guts of the machine!
Torian! See if you and the newcomer can shut down the perimeter sensor. Cover our retreat.
Report in, verde!
Wading through scrap in sector four.
Clan Chorn forces at the outer shield perimeter.
Is there no end to these abominable machines?
Ha! We are their end!
Hashar and a dozen others are dead, but we've reached the shield generators!
Then maybe Torian and our new ally should stop dawdling, eh?
Three more warriors dead, but this place resembles a junkyard.
Chorn! The generators!
Detonation in ten seconds. The shields will go down.
Maybe Torian will bother to take advantage of it.
This is Torian. Pulling out now.
